Hi All,

Regarding JUnit I have a question that can we gather all information 
of a test and print those in our customized html format without using 
ANT scripting. I need to gather information like 
1. name of Class.
2. name of method testXXXX
3. errors and failures( I can get from TestResult)
4. A short description for the method which the tester will write in 
each testmethod testXXX.

This is urgent. Please reply as soon as possible. 

Thanks,
Ravi Chaddha
